html: BREAKING NEWS: The International Whaling Commission in Brazil voted to extend AK subsistence whaling quota for 7 yrs! A momentous day for North Slope & Bering Strait regions who will be able to continue their traditional cultural practice & provide food security for generations!

html: In the last 5 years the murder rate in Alaska is up 79%. Rape is up 16%. Assault is up 36%. Robbery is up 52%. Vehicle theft is up 150%. Burglary is up 42%. #ConfrontingAKCrimeWave

html: 4) Do you think there's a risk given your influence that if we regulate we’re actually going to regulate you into a position of cemented authority?
text: 4) Do you think there's a risk given your influence that if we regulate we’re actually going to regulate you into a position of cemented authority?

html: 3) When companies become big and powerful, and accumulate a lot of wealth and power, what typically happens from this body is there’s an instinct to either regulate or break up, right?…Do you have any thoughts on those two policy approaches?

html: Today marks the second day of the government shutdown – something that was entirely avoidable. Importantly, I want to share directly with you a few updates from Washington, D.C. – specifically how we got to this point and a possible path forward.https://youtu.be/AjXoZ4tw10M
text: Today marks the second day of the government shutdown – something that was entirely avoidable. Importantly, I want to share directly with you a few updates from Washington, D.C. – specifically how we got to this point and a possible path forward.https://youtu.be/AjXoZ4tw10M

html: Yesterday, the Minority Leader had a choice. Sadly, he decided to turn a manufactured crisis into a government shutdown.pic.twitter.com/2BDeNxYmwm
text: Yesterday, the Minority Leader had a choice. Sadly, he decided to turn a manufactured crisis into a government shutdown.pic.twitter.com/2BDeNxYmwm

html: As work continues, I am hopeful that we can find a solution to reopen the government. The American people, particularly our veterans & troops, deserve better. My office stands ready to assist Alaskans, including those negatively impacted by this unnecessary government shutdown.
text: As work continues, I am hopeful that we can find a solution to reopen the government.  The American people, particularly our veterans & troops, deserve better. My office stands ready to assist Alaskans, including those negatively impacted by this unnecessary government shutdown.

html: I simply fail to understand the logic behind the Minority Leader’s decision to shut down the govt. Passage of the CR tonight would have continued the essential functions of govt, provided funding for CHIP & given Congress an opportunity to address a long term spending measure.
text: I simply fail to understand the logic behind the Minority Leader’s decision to shut down the govt. Passage of the CR tonight would have continued the essential functions of govt, provided funding for CHIP & given Congress an opportunity to address a long term spending measure.

html: The bipartisan bill we considered tonight, which funded the government until February 16th, was voted down not for the items it contained, but for what was not included – a long term agreement on immigration for which we still have weeks to resolve.
text: The bipartisan bill we considered tonight, which funded the government until February 16th, was voted down not for the items it contained, but for what was not included – a long term agreement on immigration for which we still have weeks to resolve.

html: Tonight, we saw a manufactured crisis officially turn into a government shutdown – something that was absolutely preventable.
text: Tonight, we saw a manufactured crisis officially turn into a government shutdown – something that was absolutely preventable.

html: The bill before us prevents a government shutdown, funds CHIP for six years and delays a number of harmful Obamacare taxes. While a resolution on immigration reform is important, funding the government must take priority.
text: The bill before us prevents a government shutdown, funds CHIP for six years and delays a number of harmful Obamacare taxes. While a resolution on immigration reform is important, funding the government must take priority.

html: While I believe a resolution on immigration reform – one that includes an increase in border security – should occur, keeping the government open and operational must take priority.
text: While I believe a resolution on immigration reform – one that includes an increase in border security – should occur, keeping the government open and operational must take priority.

html: The short-term funding measure currently before us, which I support, contains numerous provisions that enjoy nearly universal backing in Alaska and Congress – including a six year extension of CHIP and delays to Obamacare’s Cadillac and Medical Device taxes.
text: The short-term funding measure currently before us, which I support, contains numerous provisions that enjoy nearly universal backing in Alaska and Congress – including a six year extension of CHIP and delays to Obamacare’s Cadillac and Medical Device taxes.

html: Yet tonight, in the face of a government shutdown, the Senate Minority Leader is now emphasizing an issue he has rarely focused on – rebuilding our military – while failing to mention his primary reason for shutting down the govt – a lack of an agreement on immigration reform.
text: Yet tonight, in the face of a government shutdown, the Senate Minority Leader is now emphasizing an issue he has rarely focused on – rebuilding our military – while failing to mention his primary reason for shutting down the govt – a lack of an agreement on immigration reform.

html: For months, Congress has worked to debate and negotiate a long term spending measure – one that appropriately supports our men and women in uniform, establishes policies that grow our economy, and tackles a series of leading national priorities.
text: For months, Congress has worked to debate and negotiate a long term spending measure – one that appropriately supports our men and women in uniform, establishes policies that grow our economy, and tackles a series of leading national priorities.

html: The only thing worse than another Continuing Resolution – particularly for our military and veterans – is a government shutdown.
text: The only thing worse than another Continuing Resolution – particularly for our military and veterans – is a government shutdown.
